comments:
Select any container in Build Contents sections (i.e. bin/src includes) and in
between the two sections, right click to get context menu.  (If the NPE doesn't
show up, trying "Cut" and then keep right clicking).

This is the result from a strange usage of TableSection to host TableTree 
control in BuildContentsSection. This has broken the superclass contract
and the superclass gets NULL when trying to manipulate viewer object.

I refactored the call to fetch the current selection into the protected method 
and implemented it in BuildContentsSection using TableTreeViewer. This should 
fix the problem, but I am still shaking my head re the way TableTree has been 
retrofitted on TableSection (the proper way would be to extend 
StructuredViewerSection because you are clearly using a completely different 
kind of viewer).

Confirmed.

Moving to your inbox to fill the pop-up menu in the build contents section by 
reaching up to the editor contributor so that some shared actions are 
contributed (save, revert etc.). See how it has been done in other sections.

Added in context menu for revert and save action. 

Fixed and released to head :-)
